features_implemented.description: Leverage the LLM to suggest missing environment variables based on code analysis, framework detection, and common patterns

components.name: Code Analysis Engine
components.description: Scan workspace files to detect framework (Next.js, React, Express, etc.) and identify environment variable usage patterns

components.name: LLM Suggestion Service
components.description: Send code context to LLM service to generate intelligent suggestions for missing or recommended environment variables

components.name: Smart Suggestions UI
components.description: Add suggestions panel in environment webview showing recommended variables with descriptions and example values

components.name: One-Click Variable Addition
components.description: Allow users to add suggested variables to .env file with single click, pre-filled with safe default values

components.name: Framework Detection
components.description: Automatically detect project frameworks (Next.js, Vite, Create React App, Express, NestJS, etc.) from package.json and file structure

components.name: Common Patterns Database
components.description: Build database of common environment variable patterns for popular services (Stripe, AWS, MongoDB, etc.)

features_implemented.description: Improve LLM secret detection by providing better context and adding auto-fix suggestions

components.name: Contextual Secret Analysis
components.description: Enhance LLM analysis by sending surrounding code context, variable names, and usage patterns for better accuracy

components.name: Auto-Fix Suggestions
components.description: LLM suggests safe replacements for detected secrets (e.g., 'sk_live_...' â†’ 'process.env.STRIPE_SECRET_KEY')

components.name: Quick Fix Code Actions
components.description: Integrate with VSCode Quick Fix to allow one-click replacement of hardcoded secrets with env var references

components.name: Learning from User Feedback
components.description: Allow users to mark false positives and send feedback to improve LLM accuracy over time

features_implemented.description: Create shareable environment templates for common setups and allow team-based template distribution

components.name: Template Creation UI
components.description: Command to create templates from current .env with options to mark variables as required/optional and add descriptions

components.name: Template Library
components.description: Built-in templates for popular stacks (MERN, Next.js + Supabase, Express + MongoDB, etc.)

components.name: Template Import/Export
components.description: Import templates from .env.template files or export current setup as shareable template

components.name: Template Validation
components.description: Validate current .env against template requirements, showing missing/extra variables

components.name: Team Template Sync
components.description: Share templates via cloud sync (Doppler) so team members get consistent environment setups

features_implemented.description: Enhance backup system with scheduling, retention policies, and incremental backups

components.name: Automatic Backup Scheduling
components.description: Configure automatic backups on interval (daily, weekly) or on specific events (before switching, before git commit)

components.name: Backup Retention Policies
components.description: Set retention rules (keep last N backups, keep for X days) with automatic cleanup of old backups

components.name: Incremental Backups
components.description: Only backup changed variables to save space and improve performance for large environment files

components.name: Backup Comparison UI
components.description: Visual diff between backups showing what changed between different backup points

components.name: Backup Tags & Notes
components.description: Allow users to tag backups (pre-release, stable, experiment) and add notes for easier identification

features_implemented.description: Improve history tracking with better visualization, search, and restore capabilities

components.name: Rich History Timeline
components.description: Visual timeline showing environment changes with git commits, user actions, and auto-switches

components.name: History Search & Filter
components.description: Search history by variable name, value, date range, or user who made changes

components.name: Point-in-Time Restore
components.description: Restore environment to any specific point in history with preview of changes

components.name: Change Attribution
components.description: Show who changed each variable (if using multi-user setup) and when

components.name: Export History Report
components.description: Generate markdown/JSON report of environment changes for audit purposes

features_implemented.description: Seamless integration with Docker, docker-compose, and container environments

components.name: Docker Compose Integration
components.description: Automatically sync .env changes to docker-compose environment sections

components.name: Container Environment Export
components.description: Export .env in format suitable for Docker (-e flags, env_file, etc.)

components.name: Kubernetes ConfigMap/Secret Generation
components.description: Generate Kubernetes ConfigMaps and Secrets from .env files with proper encoding

components.name: Container Detection
components.description: Detect when running inside container and adjust file paths/sync behavior accordingly

technical_requirements: LLM service Railway deployment for AI features
user_experience_goals: Reduce manual .env setup time by 80% with smart suggestions
Professional template library matching industry standards
Enterprise-grade backup management with retention policies
Visual history navigation with git-like timeline
testing_requirements: Performance tests for large .env files (1000+ variables)
success_criteria: 90%+ accuracy in framework detection across 10+ popular frameworks
LLM suggestions accepted by users in 70%+ of cases
Template library covering 20+ common tech stacks
Docker export validates successfully with docker-compose
benefits_expected: Drastically reduced onboarding time for new developers
Fewer security incidents from hardcoded secrets
Better disaster recovery with advanced backup management
Seamless DevOps workflows with container integration

risks_mitigations.risk: LLM service downtime affecting suggestions feature
risks_mitigations.mitigation: Graceful fallback to static template suggestions, offline mode with cached data
Confidence scoring and user confirmation for detected frameworks
Community contributions via GitHub, automated template validation

risks_mitigations.risk: Backup storage bloat with automatic scheduling
risks_mitigations.mitigation: Incremental backups, compression, and automatic retention policies

risks_mitigations.risk: Docker integration complexity across different setups
risks_mitigations.mitigation: Support most common patterns first, comprehensive documentation
